title: Chiropractic Care
description: Chiropractic medicine uses various spinal adjustments to correct imbalances in the nervous and musculoskeletal systems that cause chronic pain and more.
cleaned_text: Learn More and Live Better Read the latest items in our blog. [Our team](/services/integrative-medicine/center-for-integrative-medicine/our-team) of chiropractic practitioners ensure proper joint and vertebral alignment through various spinal adjustments and manipulative techniques. Imbalances in the nervous and musculoskeletal systems can lead to chronic pain and other conditions, including: One of the many benefits of chiropractic care is that it can provide relief from chronic pain and many other musculoskeletal disorders naturally without the use of drugs or surgery. Our chiropractors work together with physical therapists, physicians and other medical professionals to coordinate your complete medical care. Chiropractic care is also beneficial for those undergoing [cancer treatment](/services/cancer/support/integrative-medicine/chiropractic). It is used to alleviate aches and pains associated with cancer diagnosis and treatment, improve flexibility and strength and minimize the side effects of treatments. During your initial visit, one of our chiropractors will perform a thorough diagnostic evaluation, taking your detailed medical history and ordering x-rays and other tests as needed, to determine your condition and outline your unique treatment program. As part of your treatment, you will lie on a table while your chiropractor performs a variety of soft tissue and manipulative techniques and stretches to the affected area. Your chiropractor may also recommend specific exercises and lifestyle modifications to ensure proper posture and sleeping habits. Chiropractic care is meant to be a comfortable procedure with minimal pain. The total treatment time following the initial visit will be approximately 15 minutes. The number of treatments required is determined by how long your condition has existed, the severity of your condition and your individual healing ability. The [Center for Integrative Medicine](/services/integrative-medicine/center-for-integrative-medicine) accepts a variety of insurance plans to cover your chiropractic treatment. Please contact your insurance provider to inquire about your coverage. Chiropractic treatment sessions are $40.
